title: Presentation of Regulations made by the Minister of Sports under Section 34(1) of Convention against Doping in Sports Act No.33 of 2013, to the Parliament
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Mahindananda Aluthgamage, Minister of Sports, to present the Extraordinary Gazette Notification No.1863/4 dated 2014?05?19 containing Regulations relating to the above, in Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
